    • Method Detail

      • clamp

        public static int clamp(int num,
                        int lower,
                        int upper)
        Clamp a number between two numbers If the number provided is lower than the lower bound, or higher than the higher bound, the number is forced within bounds
        Parameters:
        num - The number to clamp
        lower - The lower bound
        upper - The upper bound
        Returns:
        Num, or lower if num < lower, or upper if num > upper

        upper - The upper bound

        Parse a long, without throwing an exception
        Parameters:
        value - The value to parse
        radix - The radix to use
        Returns:
        The parsed value, or an empty optional if it failed.
